title: Quest for War: And One Green Beret's Subsequent Evolution
description: Quest for War details a 15 year career in Special Operations (the Green Berets) and contains the only firsthand accounts of Operation Viking Hammer, the 2003 battle against Ansar Al Islam in Northern Iraq, the Joint CIA/Green Beret Advanced Force Operations (AFO) prior to the "shock and awe," and Special OperationsÂ in the Balkans. A sobering and very human depiction of war.DoD Pre-Publication Review Case 15-S-2150
author: Mark Giaconia
